title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!Livecasino.io Promo for this week is for 1mBTC in Free spins for Bull in a Rodeo by Play'n GO!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #27 will work like this:Reward1mBTC in free spins for Bull in a Rodeo from Play'n GO!How?Opt-in by sending  PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #27 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Wager at least 10 mBTC on any games on Livecasino.io, including slots!Make at least deposit during campaign periodPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 14th August 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the rewardThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 15th August , 17:00 GMTFree spin has 1x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the free spinsNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardWe hope you enjoy!Flávio from livecasino.io team

comments.author: _livecasino.io_
comments.body: Quote from: Paxsells on August 16, 2022, 11:04:29 PMI'm not received this bonusesHi,you did not send the PM, has required for the Promo, and that is why you did not received the bonus on monday.Anyway we have decided to still give you access to the Promo and the reward has been credited into your account.Flávio from livecasino.io team
